{"id":1784804012,"question_id":4015,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1759028065,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1784804012/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Split Array With Minimum Difference","memory":"169.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long splitArray(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n\n        long long l=0, lsum = 0;\n        for (; l<N-1; l++) {\n            if (nums[l] >= nums[l+1])\n                break;\n            lsum += nums[l];\n        }\n\n        long long r=N-1, rsum = 0;\n        for (; r>=1; r--) {\n            if (nums[r-1] <= nums[r])\n                break;\n            rsum += nums[r];\n        }\n        if (abs(l - r) > 1) return -1;\n\n        if (abs(l - r) == 1) {\n            return abs(lsum - rsum);\n        } else {\n            return min(abs((lsum - (rsum - nums[l]))), \n                       abs(((lsum - nums[l]) - rsum)));\n        }\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"split-array-with-minimum-difference","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1222}
